item.title: Introducing altair, an R interface to the Altair Python Package
item.description: Introducing altair, an R package to work with the Python package Altair, which you can use to build and render Vega-Lite chart-specifications: https://vegawidget.github.io/altair Vega-Lite offers an implementation of an interactive grammar of graphics…

item.title: Welcome to vegawidget
item.description: The effort to bring Vega-Lite to the R community is collaborative; so it appropriate that the altair package be hosted by an organization. The altair R package uses the Altair Python package to create Vega-Lite specifications for interactive charts…
